Package tp.pr4.instructions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Instruction
    This interface represents an instruction supported by the application.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DropInstruction
    This instruction drops an Item from the current place and puts it the robot inventory.
    HelpInstruction
    Shows the game help with all the instructions that the robot can execute.
    MoveInstruction
    Its execution moves the robot from one place to the next one in the current direction.
    OperateInstruction
    The Instruction for using an item.
    PickInstruction
    This instruction tries to pick an Item from the current place and puts it the robot inventory.
    QuitInstruction
    Its execution request the robot to finish the simulation This Instruction works if the user writes QUIT or SALIR
    RadarInstruction
    This Instruction shows the description of the current place and the items in it.
    ScanInstruction
    The execution of this instruction shows the information of the inventory of the robot or the complete description about the item with identifier id contained in the inventory This Instruction works if the player writes SCAN or ESCANEAR (id is not mandatory)
    TurnInstruction
    Its execution rotates the robot This Instruction works if the robot writes TURN LEFT or RIGHT or GIRAR LEFT or RIGHT
